trans-unit.source: Paints an area with a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>, which can include shapes, text, video, images, or other drawings.
trans-unit.target: 使用繪製區域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>，其中可包含圖形、 文字、 視訊、 影像或其他繪圖。

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows shapes and text that were painted with a DrawingBrush.
trans-unit.target: 下圖顯示圖形和具有 DrawingBrush 所繪製的文字。

trans-unit.source: ![DrawingBrush output examples](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-drawingbrushexamples.png "DrawingBrush output examples") Shapes and text painted with a drawing brush For more information and examples, see [Painting with Images, Drawings, and Visuals](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: ![DrawingBrush 輸出範例](~/add/media/wcpsdk-mmgraphics-drawingbrushexamples.png "DrawingBrush 輸出範例")圖形和文字繪製繪圖筆刷的詳細資訊和範例，請參閱[使用映像、 繪圖和視覺效果繪製](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: The resulting brush has no content.
trans-unit.target: 產生的筆刷沒有任何內容。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> class that contains the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>類別，其中包含指定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> that describes the contents of the brush.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>描述筆刷的內容。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> that describes the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref>描述此內容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"></xref> that describes the contents of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Drawing"> </xref>描述此內容<xref href="System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The default is null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: 預設值是 null 參考 (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""> </xref>在 Visual Basic 中)。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.DrawingBrush.Drawing*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
